summary: Comprehensive testing of Blessed Belly app completed - backend APIs 100% functional, frontend UI working with minor checkout button issue

ui_bugs.issue: Button text inconsistent - shows 'Get Started' when not logged in, 'Subscribe Now' when logged in, but may have session state issues affecting clickability

passed_tests: Backend API health check and all 18 endpoints
Admin panel endpoints and data seeding
Daily check-in flow with BASEline generation
Homepage design (sage green theme, Playfair Display fonts)
Navigation between pages (Home, Pricing, Login, Signup)
Auth context and JWT token management
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: Checkout button on pricing page may have session state issues. Button text changes correctly ('Get Started' vs 'Subscribe Now') but clickability may be inconsistent. Stripe API integration works perfectly in backend testing.
